parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: RepoNamespaceName
parameters.description: The name of the namespace to which the repository belongs.

parameters.name: RepoStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the chart repositories that you want to query. Valid values:

*   `ALL`: query repositories of all status.
*   `NORMAL`: query normal repositories.
*   `DELETING`: query repositories that are being deleted.
